TITLE: Hi! I'm Ana Maria
SUBTITLE: I'm here only because i found what i like and i won't let it go!
SECTION_ABOUT_ME_TEXT: I'm a Front End Developer! Well ,a junior developer just starting this wonderful journey, but with big aspiration, with endless dreams and a lot a hope. My journey started in the 20h Talent Bootcamp,where i had the oportunity to meet a lot of talented people and adquire knowledge from them. I'm a dreamer with my feet on the ground, a nature lover, world lover. I think what best defines me is the passion that i put in all that i do,no matter that is a project or just a simple matter of my cotidian life.Positive, negative, sad, happy.I have them all. Just so greatfull for the oportunity of life that was gaved to me. I never take things for granted.
FLOATS_TEXT: This is my first responsive project made with floats. I choosed one of the best paintors to ilustrate his paintings. 'Leonid Afremov'
HOW_I_AM_TEXT: This is the first presentation page that i've made about me.
ADMINISTRATION_TEXT: Is a project of four, a project with a lot of new things, a lot of pressure and a lot of motivation. Just put your time and effort in it...
NETFLIX_TEXT: Pixel Perfect challenge with Sass, a lot of new things and a lot of passion!
FORM_TEXT: This is The Form ! My first one :) not to fancy, but mine!
SASS_TEXT: Wonderfull Sass, took me a while to love him but is just wonderfull and usefull!
CONTACT_TEXT: If you want to contact with me
FOOTER_TEXT: Stay passionate and free and you will thrive, i am sure!
CODEQUOTE: Programming isn’t something you do from 9 to 5. It’s not a job, it’s a way of life.
AUTHOR: A smart guy
